title: Beto O’Rourke snags the Democratic nomination for Texas governor.
A local candidate wants to transcend party. Does Texas allow that?
Gov. Greg Abbott wins the G.O.P. nomination, defeating challengers from the right.
Harris County, home to Houston, warns of delays in counting ballots.

sentence: Cosponsors on the legislation included two Democrats, Mark Kelly of Arizona and Maggie Hassan of New Hampshire, both of whom are facing uphill reelection battles this cycle.
author: Eric Lutz
title: Beto O'Rourke Wants Biden To End Pandemic Border Restrictions. But Not Like This.

title: Dem’s Sweetheart Slams Biden’s Border Effort
